title: Bloodland Tales
description: The enticing world under the moon. An annihilated earth, and creatures whose evil brings fear into the hearts of man. A new work by author Hewitt that describes something intangibly terrifying; the earth gone red. With men and monsters, the prose of this book has a powerful effect on the reader who wishes to learn more about the insides of the author's cavernous imagination.
author: M.J. Hewitt
